name: Just Causeâ„¢ 3: Multiplayer Mod
notes: You may still experience performance issues depending on your hardware
content:
game:
  appid: 619910
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    value: Y
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
requires: just-cause-3-steam-w-dxvk
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
